Review and analyze the provided documents with respect to the task. Craft a concise and short, unified summary that distills key information that is most relevant to the task, incorporating reference links within the summary.
Only use the information given. Do not add any additional information. The summary should be less than 5 setences

output: AutoGPT is an open-source "AI agent" that uses the internet and other tools to achieve goals by breaking them into sub-tasks. It communicates with OpenAI's API and can carry out various commands. AutoGPT is an artificial intelligence agent that can complete complex tasks without human intervention and can be used for research and code generation. It is based on the GPT-4 language model and can perform tasks autonomously. For more information, refer to the Wikipedia page on Auto-GPT (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Auto-GPT) and the TechCrunch article on Auto-GPT (https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/22/what-is-auto-gpt-and-why-does-it-matter/).

Google Search{'query': 'What is AutoGPT?'}
AutoGPT is an open-source "AI agent" that uses the internet and other tools to achieve goals by breaking them into sub-tasks. It communicates with OpenAI's API and can carry out various commands. AutoGPT is an artificial intelligence agent that can complete complex tasks without human intervention and can be used for research and code generation. It is based on the GPT-4 language model and can perform tasks autonomously. For more information, refer to the Wikipedia page on Auto-GPT (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Auto-GPT) and the TechCrunch article on Auto-GPT (https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/22/what-is-auto-gpt-and-why-does-it-matter/).

Task: What is AutoGPT?
Result:

output: AutoGPT is an open-source "AI agent" that utilizes the internet and other tools to accomplish goals by breaking them down into sub-tasks. It is an artificial intelligence agent that can complete complex tasks without human intervention and is based on the GPT-4 language model. AutoGPT communicates with OpenAI's API and can execute various commands. It is commonly used for research and code generation purposes. For more detailed information, you can refer to the Wikipedia page on Auto-GPT (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Auto-GPT) and the TechCrunch article on Auto-GPT (https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/22/what-is-auto-gpt-and-why-does-it-matter/).
